name: @voxgig/podw-next
description: Next.js component to use the Podmind widget

scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.repo-check: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && [[ '' == `git tag --list v${REPO_VERSION}` ]]
scripts.repo-tag: REPO_VERSION=`node -e "console.log(require('./package').version)"` && echo TAG: v$REPO_VERSION && git commit -a -m v$REPO_VERSION && git push && git tag v$REPO_VERSION && git push --tags;
scripts.repo-publish: npm run repo-check && npm run clean && npm install --registry https://registry.npmjs.org && npm run build && npm test && npm run repo-tag && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org --access=public
scripts.repo-publish-quick: npm run repo-check && npm run build && npm run repo-tag && npm publish --registry https://registry.npmjs.org --access=public
